title: Risk-Based Inspection Practitioner Training Program for Food Imports

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational food safety theory and basic understanding of international trade procedures
context.additional_context: Self-directed online learning environment for current practitioners, emphasizing enhanced competency in food import inspection procedures and risk management. Maximizes learning effectiveness through formative assessment-based feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can apply HACCP-based food import inspection protocols with 80% accuracy
Learners can classify risk levels of imported food products using a Risk Assessment Tool
Learners can create inspection checklists according to international food safety standards (CODEX, ISO 22000)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
